NAME: Heartbeat
SHORT: A loop that saves an empty file every 5 minutes.  Can be used with your favourite uptime checker.
DESCRIPTION: A heartbeat for the bot that allows you to check bot uptime externally if you are running it alongside a web server, using your favourite uptime checker (e.g. StatusCake).  To use on Linux, reference the timestamp.json file using PHP and compare it with a time.  Assign a HTTP code for up and down, and use this in your uptime checks.
